title: Black bean steamed scallops with noodles
description: Scallops steamed in their shells with a spicy black bean sauce.
ingredients: 8 scallops, removed from the shells, de-bearded and coral removed, shells cleaned and reserved
2.5cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, finely chopped
1 tbsp fermented salted black beans, washed and crushed into a paste (available from Asian grocers)
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh chives or spring onions
